channel.title: RSCEco - New Runescape Classic Private Server
channel.description:
hi mopar im here to advertise my new easy rsc server, *note* i am not a very good coder, i can do some things :D, im still learning how to code, so here is what i added so far, -landscape(going to become isle for people who donate) - player classes thanks to eli, -pvp event -gambling going to add soon, -say costs 10 gp each time to use, -men drop like 1.5k, to start the eco, -and im going to add drags to drop alot more, the pvp event guy will only be spawned when an event is going on, we are currently on a vps, a crappy one will upgrade soon!, atm the vps is 512mb ram which i know sucks.. so when we get some more money we are going to buy a 2gb one here are some of the pics so far
the xp rate atm is 31x [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/svmioo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2qwirya.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/o56xl3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/n6p5d5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/sb0zs2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/243kn0n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/f4ix51.jpg[/img]
website is in my sign !
if u dont have anything nice to say dont comment i will ignore u

hi mopar im here to advertise my new easy rsc server, note i am not a very good coder, i can do some things :D,
im still learning how to code, so here is what i added so far,
-landscape(going to become isle for people who donate)

  • player classes thanks to eli,
    -pvp event
    -gambling going to add soon,
    -say costs 10 gp each time to use,
    -men drop like 1.5k, to start the eco,
    -and im going to add drags to drop alot more,
    the pvp event guy will only be spawned when an event is going on,
    we are currently on a vps, a crappy one will upgrade soon!,
    atm the vps is 512mb ram which i know sucks… so when we get some more money we are going to buy a 2gb one
    here are some of the pics so far

the xp rate atm is 31x
